page.title: 18I Live in Hatfield Heath
page.content: I live in Hatfield Heath which is in Uttlesford District Council. Uttlesford is divided into parishes and ours is called Hatfield Broad Oak. There are about 550 houses and 2000 people living in our village. There are different kinds of houses such as timber frame or plaster as well as brick built and many of the houses are thatched. Some of the older houses still have cellars. There are various activities going on like Heath Players - an amateur dramatic group founded by Christopher Timothy as well as the usual ones like Scouts and Brownies etc. There are four public houses which become very popular in the summer when people visit the Heath and two very good restaurants. I love living here in the peace and tranquility of village life so do come and visit us soon.
